puzzle.title: Retro
puzzle.hint: This puzzle is a rebus.
The pictures are not one letter each - the whole puzzle is the rebus.
There are eight T's in this puzzle. EIGHTIES.

puzzle.title: Christmas Lights
puzzle.hint: Lights can't cross paths
Work from the bottom left
Once all bulbs are grouped, use the numbers
Sum the bulbs in each group and convert to a letter

puzzle.title: Ten
puzzle.hint: Each circle will contain a word
Connections have a direction
Each connection makes a compound word that fits the clue. For example, country liquor is MOON SHINE
You're looking for the connection across the two halves of the brain

puzzle.title: Ready Player One
puzzle.hint: Fill in the names of the video games in the criss-cross. Next hint has names of the games.
FROGGER, JOUST, DEFENDER, PACMAN, QBERT, DIGDUG, GALAGA, PUNCHOUT, TETRIS, DRAGONSLAIR, CENTIPEDE, ASTEROIDS, DONKEYKONG, STARWARS, POLEPOSITION, RAMPAGE
Each string of arrows gives directions to move in the grid.

puzzle.title: Upside Down
puzzle.hint: The two pages could be two sides of the same sheet (i.e. double sided)
Overlaying the two sheets you find good/evil pairs. You know one of each pair, figure out the other

Follow the rope through the first portal to GOOFUS. The rope continues to a four letter answer. Fill in that answer with the same orientation as GOOFUS. Transport the rope through to the other side, where it will now continue downward.

Pairs (evil/good) are: goofus/gallant, hulk/bruce banner, sasha fierce/beyonce, mr hyde/dr. jekyll, mr. krupp/captain underpants, kyser soze/verbal kint, heisenberg/walter white, esau/jacob, bizarro/superman, darth vader/anakin skywalker
Follow the rope, reading the circled letters in order

puzzle.title: Demogorgon (meta puzzle)
puzzle.hint: You need the answers from the four puzzles. They each clue a movie. Who are the stars of those movies?
ET: HENRY THOMAS, FIRE STARTER: DREW BARRYMORE, TRON: JEFF BRIDGES, POLTERGEIST: CRAIG T NELSON

Fold your fortune teller, there are two ways to hold it open. Each way shows half of the lettered faces. Feed the movie starts in by alternating the way you have the fortune teller open. When you finish a movie star, lift the flap to get a picture.
Pictures in order are compass, ET, Florida, 9

puzzle.title: Product Placement (bonus puzzle)
puzzle.hint: The letters of one product name appear in order in each of the movie titles
